alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 1:58PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central San Joaquin County through 300 PM PDT... At 157 PM PDT, Doppler radar was a pair of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Discovery Bay to Tracy. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Funnel clouds are possible. Locations impacted include... Stockton, Tracy, Manteca, Lathrop, Country Club, Taft Mosswood and French Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley
